name: Norton Nprotect Database File
summary: Learn about .DB- files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: DB- files are typically found in the C:\​recycler\​NPROTECT\​ directory. They can be manually deleted or removed by turning off Recycle Bin protection in Norton Utilties.

description: Data file generated by Nprotect, a file recovery feature included with Norton SystemWorks and Norton Utilities; referenced by Norton Unerase when attempting to recover deleted files.
